data.title: Calvin Harris and Ellie Goulding drop the music video for their collab 'Miracle' üôå
data.meta_description: Calvin Harris and Ellie Goulding's new collaboration 'Miracle' is out now along with the music and lyric videos. This song is their third collaboration together.
data.text:
It's a banger!

After weeks of teasing a new song with Ellie Goulding, Calvin Harris dropped his latest collaboration, 'Miracle' on 10th March. The song sees Calvin returning to his dance roots with what is already a huge hit with his fans. üôå

The DJ previously worked with Ellie on 'I Need Your Love' (2013) and 'Outside' (2014) and told us in an interview that there are: "Three good things about working with somebody," going on to explain she has: "A spectacular unique voice and delivery that can carry a song emotionally, and you‚Äôre a laugh!"

Is there a music video for 'Miracle'?

Yes, there is a music video for 'Miracle', the video features both Ellie and Calvin along with some dancers. The video is set across several different locations, starting with Ellie surrounded by a rugged terrain, in the twilight, as a cloudy red sky has flashes of lightning above her.

Calvin and Ellie have also released a lyric video which features the words to the song, over the image of a running man silhouette.

When was 'Miracle' released?

The song is out now! Calvin announced on 6th March that 'Miracle' will be released on 10th March. The singer had teased the song for weeks, and shared a video of him playing the new song on stage to thousands of fans bouncing to the new tune.

He told his Instagram followers: 'Miracle is coming this Friday!', he then added in a comment: 'Are you readyyyy'. (sic) Of course it wasn't long before fans responded to the DJ leaving comments such as: 'HELL YES!!!!!', and 'Been ready for a long timeüôåüîäüé∂‚ù§Ô∏èüåà'.

What is Calvin Harris and Ellie Goulding's new collab called?

As mentioned previously, the new song is called 'Miracle'. Calvin announced the name of the song subtly by sharing a video of Ellie in the church singing. He tagged the song name in the video and captioned his video: 'Wow @elliegoulding plus 900 year old church acoustics üò≥ New one is on the way!'.

Ellie also shared the same video with the caption: 'MIRACLE‚ú® @calvinharris'.

When they announced the song's name, fans and fellow DJs commented on the video with Diplo calling them the 'dream team' and Alesso saying it: 'Sounds amazing!'.

Another fan wrote: 'You simply cannot beat this. The content, the mystery, the history of you two. This will go down in the history books as the song that changed consciousness.'

What does the new song sound like?

Before sharing the clips above, Calvin posted a short video on social media, leaving fans very excited. In the clip Ellie can be heard singing: "When you hold me, there's a place I go, it's a different high, oh no, when you touch me, I get vulnerable in a different life, oh no."

After posting this video fans were left very excited to hear the full song. Ellie commented on the video with heart-eye emojis saying: 'üòçüòçüòç', to which a fan replied: 'can‚Äôt waitttt üî•üî•üî•' (sic) and another said: 'the duo is back! üî•'.

Following the acoustic preview inside a 900-year-old church, Calvin played the song at a gig in Argentina and sent fans wild when the beat came in. He also shared the video on Instagram telling his fans: 'Feels so good to play Miracle! It‚Äôs coming very soon! @elliegoulding'.

What is the BPM of the new song?

Calvin and Ellie's new song is a banger! The song's BPM (beats per minute) is 143 according to the clip Calvin shared, which means it's very fast, but we love it.

How did Calvin announce his new song?

Back in January, Calvin shared a photo showing himself with Ellie, dressed in black, holding some headphones and smiling at the camera. He captioned his photo: 'Back in studio!! It‚Äôs time for the third installment of our banging song trilogy'. (sic)

As Calvin mentioned this will be the third time the pair have worked together, with their previous singles 'I Need Your Love' (2013) and 'Outside' (2014) both reaching the Top 10 in the UK.

You can hear songs by Calvin Harris and Ellie Goulding on KISS.
